name: HellBreak
description:
A short game about using a grappling hook to grapple onto things for mobility and avoiding deadly pitfalls and spikes! The short game was originally created as an entry for Mini Jam 92: Death!Team:Zera - Game Designer and Programmer.PiXELiN - Artist and Composer

And special thanks to _Dya_Volo_ for giving me feedbacks on designing the menu ^^

ControlsArrow keys - fire grappling hook in whatever direction inputted.WASD - to move around.Note: The game starts in fullscreen .
